entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Snap Ownership Transfer from Microsoft to Canonical #304
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21409 | .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #303
  • .NET April 2024 Updates #302

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] GenerateReferenceAssemblySource drops constraint #100843
  • CA1820 is not being triggered when the "is" operator is used for the comparison #100834
  • [browser][MT] fail in System.Reflection.RuntimeMethodInfo.InternalInvoke #100831
    9.0.0
  • Mono Wasm V8 System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests failure #100830
  • Linq generation issue #100827
  • Hot reload fails to flow generic constraints to the inherited class #100826
  • Loop goes in wrong direction #100825
    9.0.0
  • ITrigonometricFunctions is missing Atan2 #100816
  • HMACSHA256 randomly throws: System.ArgumentException #100809
    9.0.0
  • [browser] emscripten utimensat doesn't support flags but we pass AT_SYMLINK_NOFOLLOW #100808
  • Incosistent Indentation of List Patterns in Switch Expressions #100806
  • DOTNET_GCHeapHardLimitPercent being ignored without warnings #100804
  • String.IndexOf has incorrectly behavier in Thai(Thaiand) region #100803
  • LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests crashing on linux-x64 mono interpreter #100800

Closed

  • Respecting EnumMemberAttribute in AOT'd applications #97737
    9.0.0
  • When running a Kestrel HTTPS server on Windows, unneccessary active directory authentication is attempted when accepting a new connection from a client. #100774
    9.0.0
  • Run low level EventPipe and container type native tests on CI. #82396
    9.0.0
  • Investigate why StackFrameHelperTest Trimming test fails on mono #48849
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Get the managed size of a System.Type instance #97344
    9.0.0
  • libcoreclr signal handler may cause stack overflow SIGSEGV on 3rd party library threads #95419
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #94390
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NETClients/MiscTypes/NetClientMiscTypes/NetClientMiscTypes.cmd #100738
  • System.Speech.Recognition such useless thing #100783
  • Question: Testing with ActivitySource depenedency #100813
    Future
  • Using UriFormat.SafeUnescaped replaces %20 with space in query string #100792
  • System.Net.Quic.QuicStream drops data when system CPU is under high load #100064
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Make mono_inst_name less misleading #83545
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: !m_pMethodBeingCompiled->IsDynamicMethod() #99928
    9.0.0
  • [iOS/HybridGlobalization] Force short date pattern to use yyyy #99515
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NativeClients/MiscTypes/MiscTypes.cmd #100739
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient requests only support Tls1.3 Website request failure #100799
  • Runtime build fails for Mono ARM32 Alpine #100772

PullRequests

Created

  • Make src/native/managed projects use Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler version from Version.props #100845
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adds back Enum constraint to Enum.GetNames<TEnum>() #100844
    area-System.Runtime
  • Drop generic type constraints from Unsafe.BitCast #100842
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Search for seqpoints directly from jitinfo if it's not find on get_default_jit_mm #100841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Release/8.0] Remove preventing EH and entering EE at shutdown #100836
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [mono][interp] Keep delegate alive during invocation #100832
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • WIP: another workaround for hardcoded compiler versions #100828
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Changed GetNetworkInterfaces method to to retrieve information related to all interfaces #100824
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable passing through special LLVM build modes from VMR outer build #100822
    area-Build-mono
  • Removing RUC from Default and Ambient attributes #100821
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Disable range check overflow check #100820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT][test] grow just once #100819
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][browser] fix emscripten out/err overrides #100818
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #100810
    area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm] Don't probe for aot modules unless we were built for AOT #100802
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono] Reduce number of reallocs inside interp_create_var_explicit #100801
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • Do not warn when accessing fields on T constrained to be enum #100814
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Windows x86 testing #100805
    arch-x86, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) #100833
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #100835
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #100837
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #100838
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.SizeOf #100618
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add timeout for dpkg frontend lock #100653
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable cdacreader project in source-build #100807
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix shutdown on foreign thread #100817
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap or malloc when loading bytes into heap #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser][MT] improve abort on web worker #100610
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Disable binder tracing test under gcstress #100798
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Removing unnecessary parenthesis. #100789
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Make InstallRuntimeComponentToFinalDestination use NativeOutputPath for copying to runtime output #100782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Rewrite register parameter homing #100572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix emscripten out/err overrides #100630
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Http2 deadlock #100086
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 8.0.5
  • [browser][MT] fix thread creation race with finalizer #100778
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack as library pack #100672
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Make mono_inst_name less misleading #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove _ASSERTE(!m_pMethodBeingCompiled->IsDynamicMethod()); #100797
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix mono build on alpine arm #100781
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • fix building error for `error: fallthrough annotation in unreachable code` #100742
    NO-MERGE, area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove invalid `GCPROTECT` for duplicate slot #100787
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove IDE0060 suppressions #100790
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Mark some fields readonly or const #100728
    area-Meta
  • Simplify jitconfigvalues.h #100704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix PAL test build now that we are using system headers. #100788
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100708
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add PDB support for PersistedAssemblyBuilder #100706
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #100427
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Generate custom attributes from metadata instead of type system #100763
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • GC: Fix survival rates for LOH/POH #100716
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove _init and _fini exports from NAOT and update android docs #100755
    os-android, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Align up structs to IntPtr.Size if they have gc pointers #100289
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix mismatched buffer element type #100779
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix NULL conversion warnings found in Alpine x64 Source-Build #100796
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize (typedef|table|declsec)_locator metadata loading #100157
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [release/8.0] Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #100595
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix NullReferenceException in FileSystemWatcher on Windows during dispose #100766
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser] with emscripten ASSERTIONS #100767
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Un-revert ratelimiting change #97041
    area-System.Threading
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE in Release builds #100665
    area-System.Net
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update CI builds to not use VS Previews #100622
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.5
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • enable AutomaticOrManual_DoesntFailRegardlessOfWhetherClientCertsAreAvailable test #100496
    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, 9.0.0
  • Introduce a `BuildAllTestsAsStandalone` environment variable to support some local dev scenarios. #100709
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET to represent loading error register upon return #100692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use multi-reg load/store for DecodeFromUTF8 #100589
    arch-arm64, area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100734
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100426
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement ConditionalSelect API #100718
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #100669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for bounds check no throw assertions in range check #100777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not merge: Remove hardcoded list of compiler versions in init-comp… #100761
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix official build by moving the pool provider import to the global variable section #100784
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix class construction cycle in Lock on NativeAOT #100374
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add missing GC wbarriers for static field stores with hotreload enabled #100775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • ilc.exe is emitting the sse instruction, xorps, with --instruction-set base #2545

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • Unhandled exception: Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WorkloadManifestReader.WorkloadManifestCompositionException: Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current' version '8.0.3' is lower than version '8.0.4' required by manifest 'microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.current' #40070
  • I was struggling with omnisharp not resolving the dotnet-sdk snap on 20.04 until I discovered that a simple #40068
  • API HttpWebRequest.GetSystemWebProxy not real time #40062

Closed

  • print-usage-on-error: should be for specific class of errors #40069
  • AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild failing to `new` F# projects #40011
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40072
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40071
  • dotnet build failed exit code #10515
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #40089
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #40088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #40087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #40086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40085
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge dotnet/Installer `src` and `test` folder histories #40084
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #40081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • delete nonexistent feeds #40067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.2xx #40077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #40083
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #40082
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #40080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #40079
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #40078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update EOL versions #39645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2426469 #40043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Respect the profile attribute on runtime packs #39402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #39840
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update the help text for dotnet tool run and dotnet tool local install #39827
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Set dotnet-watch timeout based on XUnitWorkItemTimeout #40028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Adjust dynamic binding rules for a situation of a single applicable candidate. #8027

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XAML files are part of a miscellaneous workspace rather than actual C# workspace #72959
  • Find References should support UnsafeAccessorAttribute #72958
  • IDE0028 raised erroneously for collection type with Add(T) and IEnumerable<T[]> #72956
  • "Conceptual" Search is required as C# syntax evolves #72955

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.dotnetVS-34808.241 #72953

PullRequests

Created

  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have dynamic result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72964
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix notification handler tests to use per server task completion instances #72963
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Free resources in a try/finally #72961
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update `InitializeHandler` to support `VSInternalClientCapabilities` #72960
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Sync options in parallel between the host and OOP. #72952
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove less individual sync calls to get compilation options. #72951
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions, extension methods or expanded non-array params cases. #72950
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72947
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add a unit test to cover the unified setting's registration file. #72946
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Update TS EA api argument to accurately represent it is optional #72962
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add bulk add/remove project capability to the workspace. #72957
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to an async batchign work queue for processing diagnostics #72942
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Sync less project attributes. #72930
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230
    Next
  • Not for review. Logging. #72949
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #72940
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Move to a callback-style approach to deserializing objects (part2) #72944
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have `dynamic` result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid asserting unvisited nested binary operators #72935
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes #55036
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #55035
  • `dotnet workload install wasm-tools` fails due to required `8.0.4` dependency #55032
  • Apire Components APIs #55031
  • Rename and update description of AspNetCoreRuntime package #55030
    9.0-preview4
  • Notify Unhandled Circuit Exception #55027
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #55022

Closed

  • Blazor Web App - AuthorizationPolicy not found when using Global WebAssembly #55028
  • Streamrendering in Blazor SSR doesn't work behind reverse proxy #55029
  • "Authorize" attribute in razor page in webassembly project requires also authorization on server side #52530
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: plaintext #55023
  • Issue with 1Password Extension Causing High CPU Usage in Blazor WebAssembly Application with OIDC Authentication #54959
  • [Identity] Implementations of `IUserTwoFactorTokenProvider` are blindly assuming their method is supported #53888
    Backlog
  • ASPNET Core 8.0 Identity Facebook External Provider Integration does not work. "The oauth state was missing or invalid." #53878
  • IdentityCookieAuthenticationBuilderExtensions causing 404 Not Found #53719
  • Blazor server side app running under IIS #55019
  • Brotli Compression Just Work For text/html #55024
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext, updates #54994

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for generating OpenAPI parameters #55041
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI request bodies #55040
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #55038
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #55037
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #55034
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

Updated

  • Add support for generating OpenAPI responses #55020
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • Static pages amid global interactivity #54948
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grid Tap Gestures aren't limited to the cells they are assigned to #21740
  • Improve information/experience around x:DataType behaviour in Debug vs Release #21735
  • Silent workload updates break builds #21734
  • Review / Rename any Xamarin branding #21732
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Entry Text changing to black on slider change when is light mode iOS #21731
  • Firebase Messaging (FCM) is not working in Maui net8.0 #21730
  • [iOS] Collectionview itemslayout styling changes with footer #21728
  • MAUI CI build hangs when running on ARM Apple M machines #21727
  • [IOS] KeyboardAutoScrollManager NullReferenceException when focussing Editor/Entry in modal bottom sheet #21726
  • [iOS] Button FontFamily not working together with CharacterSpacing #21722
  • CollectionView with AdaptiveTrigger not rendered properly #21719
  • Android: Entry.VerticalTextAlignment ignored if layouted in Grid row with fix height #21717

Closed

  • Compatibility HorizontalStackLayout does not constrain correctly #12415
    Backlog
  • Compatibility elements don't work as expected #15454
    Backlog
  • [Hot Reload] Hot reload currently fails if you have service scope validation enabled #21081
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Cascading memory leak when StrokeShape is set via a global style on Border control #20163
    Backlog
  • Cascading memory leak when StrokeShape is set on Border control on iOS #20121
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Windows Unpackaged support in .NET MAUI #10564
    Backlog
  • [testing] xharness can't boot and install app on 14.5 simulators with macOS Sonoma #18989
    Backlog
  • [testing] TestTemplates RuniOS fails a lot on iOS #21077
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Template tests xharness issues #20623
    Backlog
  • Unable to deploy maui app on ios #19671
  • Unexpected DataTrigger Behaviour on Android #21004
  • LinearGradientBrush in global style does not work #20097
  • Hybrid (MAUI Blazor) app crashes on iOS 17.4 #21707

PullRequests

Created

  • Init the flex item before adding it to the layout #21737
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #21733
  • Binding source generator #21725
  • [Testing] Update Appium to RC7 #21720
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR4

Merged

  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • Update GitInfo.txt to 8.0.21-preview #21729

  • [net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back (#20727) and make sure Android works too #21636

  • [Catalyst] Add default FilePickerFileTypes #21689

Updated

  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Light up HideSoftInputOnTappedChanged for catalyst #21529

  • Clarify PlatformImage supported image formats docs #21697

  • [Catalyst,Windows] Allow drag item from outside the app #21684
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Avoid hang or crash loading CollectionView with thousands of elements #21422
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix CarouselView behavior with device orientation changes #21635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Document NavigableElement #21507

  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21658

  • [iOS] FlyoutHeader size change fix #21692

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generic type converters for property types. #33497
  • 'Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'collection')' after apply groupBy #33494

Closed

  • Cannot do GroupBy over a complex type #33491
    9.0.0
  • Compiled models - execution of Initialize is slow #33495

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove CodeQL trigger for 2.1 #33502
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #33501
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #33500
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #33499

Merged

  • Support GroupBy over complex type #33493

Updated

  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-09
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Use the repo asset manifests to discover dependency versions #19389
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #19387
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #19386
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #19385
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #19384
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #19383
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #19382
  • .NET Source-Build 7.0.118 April 2024 Updates #19381
  • .NET Source-Build 8.0.104 April 2024 Updates #19380
  • Create binlog for init-source-only.proj only when requested #19379
  • .NET Source-Build 6.0.129 April 2024 Updates #19371
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #19370
  • Add Join-Verticals task, use it at the final Join Point #19369
  • Run tests by default and again enable them in UB #19366

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #19378
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #19377
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #19376
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #19375
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #19374
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #19373
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.2xx #19372
  • Use Traversal SDK to build tools #19362
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #19354
  • Delete dead properties from the VMR orchestrator #19365
  • Fix test results publishing on Windows #19364
  • Use Microsoft.Build.NoTargets in repo-projects #19363
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #19361
  • [VMR] Light up NativeAOT OSX short lanes #19355
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #19345
  • Add explicit arcade reference #19360
  • Make SmokeTests use repo infrastructure #19290

Updated

  • Add Unified Build produced NuGet package validation against official build #19304
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2426306 #19344
  • [VMR] Light up Alpine lanes #19332
  • Enable efcore in the VMR build #19313
